entries.value: {"functionalRequirements":{"basicOperations":["Addition (a + b)","Subtraction (a - b)","Multiplication (a × b)","Division (a ÷ b with zero handling)"],"advancedOperations":["Power (a^b)","Square root (√a)","Percentage calculations","Memory functions (M+, M-, MR, MC)","History of calculations"],"userInterface":["Command-line interface (CLI)","Interactive prompt mode","Batch calculation mode","Expression parser for complex calculations"],"inputHandling":["Validate numeric inputs","Handle decimal numbers","Support negative numbers","Parse mathematical expressions","Error handling for invalid inputs"]},"nonFunctionalRequirements":{"performance":["Response time < 100ms for calculations","Support for large numbers (BigInt)","Efficient memory usage"],"reliability":["Graceful error handling","Input validation","Divide by zero protection","Overflow/underflow detection"],"usability":["Clear error messages","Help documentation","Intuitive command structure","Calculation history"],"maintainability":["Modular architecture","Unit tests with >90% coverage","Integration tests","Performance benchmarks","Clear documentation"]},"additionalFeatures":["Scientific notation support","Constants (π, e)","Trigonometric functions (future)","Logarithmic functions (future)","Unit conversions (future)"]}
